means: 耆那教（印度非婆罗门教的一派）

sentence.Network_en: Other religious groups include Christianity, Sikhism, Jainism, Buddhist and Zoroastrian.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他的宗教团体包括了基督教 、 锡克教 、 耆那教 、 佛教和祆教.

sentence.Network_en: The faiths represented were Buddhism, Christianity, Islam, Hinduism, Jainism, Judaism and the Brahma Kumaris.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些信仰代表的是佛教 、 基督教 、 伊斯兰教 、 印度教 、 耆那教 、 犹太教和梵天库马里斯.

sentence.Network_en: The exercises of yoga were incorporated into three of the Indian religions: Hinduism, Jainism and Buddhism.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑜伽运动整合到印度三大宗教中: 印度教 、 耆那教以及佛教.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Logic of Jainism耆那教的逻辑思想

means.word_mean: 1. sect founded in the 6th century BC as a revolt against Hinduism
2. religion founded in the 6th century BC as a revolt against Hinduism; emphasizes asceticism and immortality and transmigration of the soul; denies existence of a perfect or supreme being
